Docs.typeparam: The class defining which columns to take from the incoming data.
The class defining which new columns are added to the data.
Docs.param: The mapping action. This must be thread-safe and free from side effects. If the resulting transformer needs to be save-able, the class defining should implement and needs to be decorated with with the provided . The assembly containing the class should be registered in the environment where it is loaded back using .
The contract name, used by ML.NET for loading the model. If is specified, resulting transformer would not be save-able.
Additional parameters for schema mapping between and input data. Useful when dealing with annotations.
Additional parameters for schema mapping between and output data. Useful when dealing with annotations.
Docs.summary: Create a , which applies a custom mapping of input columns to output columns.
